intro: Thlaspi pawlowskii, commonly known as the yellow rocket, is a flowering plant in the Brassicaceae family. It is characterized by its bright yellow flowers and is often found in disturbed soils such as roadsides and fields. The plant has alternate, pinnately compound leaves that are covered in fine hairs. It produces small, capsule-like fruits that contain numerous seeds. Thlaspi pawlowskii is a winter annual, meaning it completes its life cycle within a single growing season.
